sentences.en: " Go back five generations,'says Yale's Kidd. " You have 32 ancestors.
sentences.cn: “ 上溯五代, ” 耶鲁大学的凯德说, “ 你有32个祖先.

sentences.en: Although, through these three presidents, I understand that the quality of Yale graduates is not so even.
sentences.cn: 但是透过这三位总统我也明白了，耶鲁大学的毕业生的水准也并不很平均。

sentences.en: He graduated from Yale University in 1915.
He graduated from Yale University in １９１５.
He is of the Yale vintage.
He took a master's degree in economics at Yale.
sentences.cn: 他选择了攻读耶鲁大学的经济学硕士学位。

sentences.en: He was my senior at Yale by two years.
sentences.cn: 他是耶鲁大学比我高两级的学生.

sentences.en: His class voted him the man "who had done the most for Yale."
sentences.cn: 他被班里评选为“为耶鲁作出最大贡献”的人。

sentences.en: I came into contact with very bright Harvard and Yale students.
sentences.cn: 我接触到一些非常聪明的哈佛和耶鲁的学生。

sentences.en: Paul Sherman Yale was small, spry and upright.
sentences.cn: 保罗·谢尔曼·耶尔身材矮小, 动作敏捷,站得笔挺.

sentences.en: Ray Fair, my colleague at Yale, for one, warns that any trend up or down may suddenly be reversed if there is an economic “regime change” — a shift big enough to make people change their thinking.
sentences.cn: 我在耶鲁大学的同事雷．费尔警告说，任何向上或向下的趋势可能会突然发生逆转，如果是经济的“政权更替”一个足够大的改变可使人们改变他们的想法。

sentences.en: She has recently joined the faculty of Yale University.
sentences.cn: 她最近当了耶鲁大学的教授.

sentences.en: The most exciting game was Harvard versus Yale.
sentences.cn: 最富紧张刺激的球赛是哈佛队对耶鲁队.

sentences.en: These two members of Yale's Class of '57 never miss a reunion.
sentences.cn: 这两个耶鲁大学57届毕业生每次同学聚会都参加。

sentences.en: Under Yale's penetrating gaze, he wished he hadn't mentioned it.
sentences.cn: 在耶尔敏锐的目光注视之下, 他真后悔不该提起这件事.

sentences.en: What is the endowment of Yale?
sentences.cn: 耶鲁的捐赠基金是什么？

sentences.en: Yale seemed able to walk into the Governor's office whenever he chose.
sentences.cn: 看样子,耶尔只要高兴,随时可以走进州长办公室.

sentences.en: Yale shook his head in a gesture of perplexity.
sentences.cn: 耶尔带着惶惑不解的神情,摇了摇头.
